title: Among Elms and Maples juxtaposition of values

content.question: The poem as a whole juxtaposes Walker Evans’ values with the speaker’s by presenting the Evans photograph as a metaphor for the

choices.label: power of art to create beauty out of suffering
invasion of industry into formerly rural settings
incomplete nature of an artist’s perspective

content.answer: incomplete nature of an artist’s perspective

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain the function of contrasting characters.
